hadoop.table

Class CountTableRows.Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<PrimaryKey,Row,Text,IntWritable>
      • hadoop.table.CountTableRows.Map
  • Enclosing class:
    CountTableRows

    public static class CountTableRows.Map
extends Mapper<PrimaryKey,Row,Text,IntWritable>
    Nested class used to map input key/value pairs to a set of intermediate key/value pairs in preparation for the reduce phase of the associated MapReduce job. The Hadoop MapReduce framework spawns one task -- running an instance of this class -- for each TableInputSlit generated by the TableInputFormat employed by the job.
